attributes.action: Make Prince William King, and take control of the country. Then Fire Parliament.
attributes.additional_details: I say, long live King William! and fire the incompetent rabble in Westminster. Perhaps finally someone will be in charge who actually has His people at heart in the decisions made. #democracy is overrated when the world is in freefall.
attributes.background: If a client hired a number of experts and they didn't do their job to the satisfaction of the client, they would be fired...  But if the client is the TAX Payer and the expert is parliament, then its a whole other story...
